name: Jérôme Gagnon-Voyer
tagline: Bilingual IT Consultant in Toronto / Consultant en informatique à Toronto
body:
### Summary
In the past, I have worked with organizations in the sectors of finance, health, media and non-profit and have helped them implement new IT solutions. I specialize on big data projects where I can use my expertise in business intelligence to develop solutions that will make data discovery easy to use across your company.

### Contact
Email: jerome@gagnonvoyer.com  
Phone: 647-995-2103

### Skills:
Endeca Information Discovery - Big Data  
Salesforce.com (APEX & Visualforce.com)  
PHP / MySQL  
Java & Liferay Portal  
Node.js / MongoDB
